item.title: 农场主正在培育杂交奶牛以出售肉牛
item.description:
对美国乳制品生产商来说，额外的收入来源是一个值得欢迎的推动力，这几年他们的牛奶销售形势严峻。【原文：

The additional income stream is a welcome boost for US dairy producers, who’ve had a tough couple of years selling milk.

】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。贝莱德（BlackRock）的里德（Rieder）表示，美联储应该削减而不是加息来降低通胀，一位大宗商品资深交易员认为他找到了有史以来最好的交易。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Stocks pull back after another strong week, BlackRock’s Rieder says the Fed should cut, not hike, to bring down inflation, and a commodities veteran reckons he’s found the best trade he’s ever seen. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 斯坦霍普的平托表示，英国需要采取更多措施促进伦敦的首次公开募股
item.description: 斯坦霍普资本公司（Stanhope Capital）创始人兼首席执行官丹尼尔-平托（Daniel Pinto）表示，随着全球交易和首次公开募股活动在经历了近两年的低迷后开始回暖，英国需要加大力度吸引更多公司在伦敦上市。【原文：Stanhope Capital founder and Chief Executive Officer Daniel Pinto said the UK needs to up its game to attract more company listings in London as deals and initial public offerings start to pick up around the world after almost two years of subdued activity.】

item.title: 比亚迪电子将加入香港基准指数
item.description: 据一份声明称，比亚迪电子国际有限公司（BYD Electronic International Co.碧桂园服务控股有限公司（Country Garden Services Holdings Co.【原文：BYD Electronic International Co. will be added to Hong Kong’s Hang Seng Index following its latest quarterly review, according to a statement. Country Garden Services Holdings Co. will be removed from the measure.】

item.title: GameStop 和 AMC 两天斥资 70 亿美元后股价上涨
item.description: GameStop Corp.和 AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc.将结束两天来的溃败，价值缩水约 70 亿美元，本周的备忘录股票狂热有进一步消退的迹象。【原文：GameStop Corp. and AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc. were set to snap a two-day rout that erased about $7 billion in value, amid further signs of this week’s meme-stock frenzy fading.】

item.title: 寄生虫疫情爆发后，西南水务公司将赔偿 180 万英镑
item.description: 西南水务有限公司将向客户支付约 180 万英镑（230 万美元）的赔偿金，因为寄生虫进入了当地供水系统，导致数十人患病。【原文：South West Water Ltd. is set to pay customers around £1.8 million ($2.3 million) in compensation after a parasite got into the local water supply, causing dozens of people to become ill.】

item.title: Meme-Stock 狂潮再起表明美国股市一片火热
item.description:
调查显示，GameStop 和 AMC 的最新交易是逆向指标 卖出

。【原文：

Latest trading in GameStop and AMC is a contrarian indicator to sell, some say in survey

】

item.title: 反对相对绩效的论据
item.description:
泰尔沃思的约翰-沃伦（John Warren ）告诉《梅林谈钱》（Merryn Talks Money ）投资者对经理人的业绩与指数并不感兴趣，他们只想赚钱。【原文：

Tellworth’s John Warren tells Merryn Talks Money investors aren’t interested in a manager’s record versus an index—they just want to make money.

】

item.title: 新刺激政策推动新兴市场连续第四周上涨
item.description: 新兴市场股票和货币连续第四周上涨，原因是投资者权衡了美国降息的前景，以及从中国到土耳其等发展中国家为支撑本国经济所做的新努力。【原文：Emerging-market stocks and currencies headed for a fourth consecutive week of gains as investors weighed US rate cut prospects amid fresh efforts by developing nations to shore up their economies from China to Turkey.】

item.title: 美银美林的 Hartnett 认为债券下半年即将卷土重来
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的策略师认为，随着宏观经济形势趋软，长期债券将在 2024 年晚些时候卷土重来。【原文：Long-duration bonds are set for a comeback later in 2024 as macroeconomic conditions soften, according to strategists at Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 多诺霍说：欧洲经济需要更快增长
item.description: 欧元集团主席帕斯卡尔-多诺霍（Paschal Donohoe）周五表示，欧洲经济需要更快的增长。【原文：Europe’s economy needs see faster growth, Eurogroup President Paschal Donohoe said Friday.】

item.title: 美联储中枢聚会再起波澜，债券牛市卷土重来
item.description: 欢迎收看《每周快讯》（Weekly Fix），这是一份期待下个月到来的轻松时刻的时事通讯。我是彭博社亚洲市场直播团队负责人加菲尔德-雷诺兹（Garfield Reynolds）。【原文：Welcome to the Weekly Fix, the newsletter that’s looking for easier times to arrive next month. I’m Garfield Reynolds, Bloomberg’s Markets Live team leader in Asia.】

item.title: 签证调整带来中国国际航空客流量增长
item.description: 4 月份，中国国际航空客运量恢复到疫情前水平的 80% 以上，这反映了中国政府为吸引更多海外游客到中国旅游所做的努力，以及疫情过后中国人出国旅游的意愿日益高涨。【原文：China’s international air passenger traffic recovered to over 80% of pre-Covid levels in April, reflecting efforts by Beijing to attract more overseas visitors to the nation’s shores and a growing propensity of Chinese to travel abroad after the pandemic.】

item.title: 随着大选日益临近，亨特希望额外削减英国薪资税
item.description: 英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）表示，如果经济形势允许，他将在秋季第三次削减英国国民保险，因为他领导的保守党正在寻求与民调领先的工党在税收问题上的分界线，尽管工党主持着数十年来最高的税负。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Jeremy Hunt said he’ll cut UK national insurance for a third time in the autumn if economic circumstances permit, as his governing Conservatives seek dividing lines with the poll-leading Labour Party on tax despite presiding over the highest burden in decades.】

item.title: 新鹏汽车在香港推出售价 3.84 万美元的电动 SUV，扩大销售范围
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商新鹏公司将在香港推出一款运动型多用途车和小型货车，以加强全球扩张，提高销量。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Xpeng Inc. is bringing a sports utility vehicle and minivan to Hong Kong as it ramps up a global expansion to boost sales.】

item.title: 中国人民银行将设立 3,000 亿元公共住房贷款项目
item.description: 中国人民银行将为公共住房设立一个 3,000 亿元人民币（合 415 亿美元）的再贷款项目，与此同时，官员们还推出了一系列前所未有的措施来稳定房地产行业。【原文：The People’s Bank of China will establish a 300 billion yuan ($41.5 billion) relending program for public housing, as officials roll out an unprecedented slew of measures to stabilize the real estate sector.】

item.title: 杰夫-库里谈铜和这次大宗商品反弹的不同之处
item.description:
一位资深专家回顾了超级周期理论。【原文：

A veteran of the space looks back on the supercycle thesis.

】

item.title: 杰夫-库里谈为何铜是他最不喜欢的交易
item.description:
以及为什么对大宗商品超级周期的预期没有实现。【原文：

And why expectations for a commodities supercycle didn't materialize.

】

item.title: 杰夫-库里说铜是他职业生涯中见过的最好的交易
item.description:
"价格必须走高，"这位大宗商品资深人士说。【原文：

‘Prices have got to go higher,’ the commodities veteran says.

】

item.title: 香港正式启动数字人民币支付试点
item.description: 香港启动了一项试点计划，通过中国主要银行实现人民币数字支付，这是中国货币项目在内地以外部署的首个实例。【原文：Hong Kong launched a pilot program enabling digital yuan payments through major Chinese banks, the first example of China’s currency project being deployed beyond the mainland.】

item.title: 印度财政部长称印度年轻消费者将推动经济发展 30 年
item.description: 印度财政部长尼尔马拉-西塔拉曼（Nirmala Sitharaman）表示，印度的年轻人口将在未来三十年内保持较高的消费需求，从而支撑印度经济的快速增长。【原文：India’s young population will keep consumption demand high for the next three decades, underpinning rapid growth in the economy, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said.】

item.title: 印度最大垃圾债券面临债权人要求推迟发行
item.description: 印度有史以来规模最大的高收益卢比公司债券由多家全球私人信贷基金持有，这使印度信贷市场的小部分压力成为焦点。【原文：India’s biggest ever high-yield rupee corporate bond, held by a number of global private credit funds, is casting a spotlight on pockets of stress within the nation’s credit markets.】

item.title: 与恐怖组织有关联的男子在车站袭击中杀害马来西亚警察
item.description: 据马来西亚警方负责人称，马来西亚柔佛州的一个警察局遭到袭击，两名执法人员遇害，袭击者与一个激进组织有联系，袭击引发了对该组织成员的围捕。【原文：Two Malaysian law enforcement officers were killed following an attack on a police station in Johor state, triggering a roundup of members of a militant organization that the attacker had ties with, according to the country’s police chief.】

item.title: LandSec 的房地产投资组合年内损失 6.25 亿英镑
item.description: 由于利率上升对商业地产的影响，兰德证券集团公司（Land Securities Group Plc）去年将其英国房地产投资组合的价值降低了 6%。【原文：Land Securities Group Plc marked down the value of its UK real estate portfolio by 6% last year as rising interest rates weighed on commercial property.】

item.title: 天气再次影响作物生长，大米反弹至 15 年高点
item.description: 天气再次扰乱了大米市场，使这种主食的价格在平静一段时间后又回到了 15 年高点的边缘。【原文：Weather is rattling the rice market once more, driving prices of the food staple back to the cusp of 15-year highs after a period of calm.】

item.title: Cardi B 代言的辣酱面促使韩国股票大涨 30
item.description: 韩国一家方便面生产商周五公布了好于预期的收益，说唱歌手卡迪-B（Cardi B）最近在社交媒体上介绍的一款产品帮助该公司股价大涨，突破了日涨幅限制。【原文：A South Korean instant noodle maker’s stock jumped by their daily limit Friday after posting better-than-expected earnings with help from a product recently featured on social media by rapper Cardi B.】

item.title: 圣米格尔首席执行官称 "没问题"，外汇损失冲击第一季度利润
item.description: 菲律宾销售额最大的企业集团生力公司总裁周五对公司今年下半年的盈利前景充满信心，此前外汇兑换损失严重影响了公司第一季度的利润。【原文：The president of San Miguel Corp., the Philippines’ largest conglomerate by sales, on Friday struck a confident tone on the company’s earnings prospects for the rest of the year, after foreign exchange losses weighed heavily on first-quarter profit.】

item.title: 南非将实现 15 年来首次基本预算盈余
item.description: 南非很可能在 15 年来首次实现基本预算盈余（收入超过非利息支出），这将使其走上阻止债务进一步增长的道路，而债务的增长速度已经高得令人担忧。【原文：South Africa likely achieved a primary budget surplus — where revenue exceeds non-interest expenditure — for the first time in 15 years, setting it on a path to arrest further growth in debt that’s already worryingly high.】

item.title: 摩根资产重启以政府为重点的货币市场基金
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s asset management arm has created a new European money market fund focused on public debt, a kind of investment that largely disappeared when interest rates were negative.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股票和债券今年表现最佳
item.description: 伦敦城。摄影师：Mike Kemp/Getty Images【原文：The City of London. Photographer: Mike Kemp/Getty Images】
